title: Bug 125678 - The original chart instance in report design handle is not modified after running the report.
OB: When running the report in my application, I obtain the design time instance of the chart. After calling the method to run the report, I expect the chart to be updated with the appropriate data. However, this is not happening. The chart remains unmodified. This functionality was working correctly in BIRT2.0M3, but it is not working as expected in BIRT RC and 2.0 version.
SR: The issue is that the original chart instance in the report design handle is not being modified after running the report. This should be investigated and fixed.
